cab.content:
C.M. 47(46). 15th May, 1946.
India: Constitutional Position.
P.M. Explained re-action of Cab. Mission to proposed amendmts.
Agreed: accept final text of statement in form desired by
Short statement – not v. good. W.S.C. & A.E. want to read whole
statement. Adjournment, but not long debate.
Read out message.
In circs., as they say they won’t take responsibility, give them O.K.
for the statement & follow up with warning as drafted.
H.D. Three good men on the spot. Must give them discretion on this.
They might resign.
You have put our views – must trust their judgement.
J. Agreed. They are steeped in atmosphere.
mission.
P.M. to read out full text in H/Commons.
